22 void poseGrabber(geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose)
23 {
24  lock_pose.lock();
25  current_pose=pose;
26  lock_pose.unlock();
27  /*ROS_INFO_STREAM("--------------------------------");
28  ROS_INFO_STREAM("--------------------------------");
29  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Got current pose as x=" << pose->pose.position.x << " saved as " << current_pose.pose.position.x);
30  ROS_INFO_STREAM("--------------------------------");
31  ROS_INFO_STREAM("--------------------------------");*/
32 }
33 
34 void statusGrabber(std_msgs::String::ConstPtr status)
35 {
36  lock_status.lock();
37  result=status->data;
38  lock_status.unlock();
39 }

42 int main(int argc, char **argv)
43 {
44  ros::init(argc, argv, "position_test");
45  ros::NodeHandle nh;
46  tf::TransformListener tf_listener;
47 
48  ros::Publisher cmd_pos = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("/RobotControl/PoseControl", 1000);
49  ros::Subscriber tool_pose = nh.subscribe("/j2s7s300_driver/out/tool_pose",1000, poseGrabber );
50  ros::Subscriber control_status = nh.subscribe("/RobotControl/Status",1000, statusGrabber );
51 
52  ros::Rate loop_rate(9);
53  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped temp_pose;
54 
55  std::string end_eff_frame = tf_listener.resolve("j2s7s300_end_effector");
56  std::string base_frame = tf_listener.resolve("j2s7s300_link_base");
57 
58  // This loop to wait until subscriber starts returning valid poses.
59  while(ros::ok())
60  {
61  lock_pose.lock();
62  temp_pose.pose.position.x = current_pose.pose.position.x;
63  lock_pose.unlock();
64 
65  ros::spinOnce();
66  loop_rate.sleep();
67 
68  if (temp_pose.pose.position.x != 0) break;
69  }
70 
71  ROS_INFO("Pose data available");
72  bool success = false;
73 
74 
76  success = false;
77  while(!success)
78  {
79  try
80  {
81  //Necessary to make sure tf and pose sync properly
82  lock_pose.lock();
83  start_pose=current_pose;
84  lock_pose.unlock();
85 
86  geometry_msgs::Quaternion quat = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(angles::from_degrees(10),angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0));
87  start_pose.header.frame_id=end_eff_frame;
88  start_pose.pose.position.x=0;
89  start_pose.pose.position.y=0;
90  start_pose.pose.position.z=0;
91  start_pose.pose.orientation = quat;
92 
93  tf_listener.transformPose(base_frame,start_pose,pose_in_base);
94  success=true;
95  }
96  catch (tf::ExtrapolationException e)
97  {
98  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Waiting for transform "
99  //<< e.what()
100  );
101  }
102  ros::spinOnce();
103  loop_rate.sleep();
104  }
105 
106  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Start pose :" << start_pose);
107  ROS_INFO_STREAM("pose_in_base pose :" << pose_in_base);
108  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Publishing goal pose ");
109  cmd_pos.publish(pose_in_base);
110 
111  //Wait until action completed
112  std::string temp_res="";
113  while(ros::ok())
114  {
115  ros::spinOnce();
116  lock_status.lock();
117  temp_res = result;
118  lock_status.unlock();
119  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Status : " << temp_res);
120  if (temp_res=="Stopped") break;
121  }
122 
123  //Wait 1.5s extra for arm to settle due to inertia.
124  ros::Time start = ros::Time::now();
125  while(ros::Time::now()-start < ros::Duration(1.5)) ros::spinOnce();
126 
127  ros::spinOnce();
128  lock_pose.lock();
129  start_pose=current_pose;
130  lock_pose.unlock();
131  ROS_INFO_STREAM("End pose :" << start_pose);
132 
133 
134  ros::spinOnce();
135  return 0;
136 }
